en.answer:
No, you cannot.

You can only activate the effect of your Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames if it was already in the Graveyard at the time that a monster is Special Summoned to your opponent's field. When the effect of your opponent's Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames resolves, destroying your Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames and Special Summoning their Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames are treated as having happened simultaneously. Therefore, your Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames is not treated as having been in your Graveyard at the time that your opponent's Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames was Special Summoned to their field.
en.question: The effect of my opponent's Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames resolves, destroying my Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames and Special Summoning my opponent's Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames to their field. Afterwards, can I activate the effect of my destroyed Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames?
en.title: If my Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by the effect of my opponent's Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames, can I afterwards activate my Promethean Princess, Bestower of Flames' effect?

ja.answer:
発動できません。

「<<19507>>」の③の効果を発動するためには、相手フィールドにモンスターが特殊召喚された時点で、既にその「<<19507>>」が墓地に存在する必要があります。「<<19507>>」の③の効果による破壊と特殊召喚は同時に行われる扱いですので、相手の「<<19507>>」が特殊召喚された時点では、自分の「<<19507>>」は墓地に存在せず、発動の条件を満たしていません。
ja.question: 相手の「<<19507>>」の③の効果によって自分フィールドの「<<19507>>」が破壊され墓地へ送られ、相手フィールドに「<<19507>>」が特殊召喚されました。この一連のチェーン処理後に、自分はその破壊された「<<19507>>」の③の効果を発動できますか？
ja.title: 相手の「<<19507>>」の③の効果で破壊され墓地へ送られた自分の「<<19507>>」は、その処理後に③の効果を発動できますか？
